DescriptionData.Title: AJs 23" Striped Leg Warmers w/ Welt
DescriptionData.Description:
These striped leg warmers are perfect for teams or any dance group that needs an easy uniform accessory. They are also a nice fashion statement for anyone, and will keep you warm. They are stretchy enough to cover blue jeans, but have enough elastic in them to keep them in place.
These fun striped leg warmers have a stylish rib at the top and at the bottom and are made from 91% acrylic and 9% elastic. Sized to fit most adults (22 inches in length)
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Sized to fit most adults (22 inches in length)
